EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne Tour_PARENT_2019.STL Post Event
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for attending SpringOne Tour 2019 in St. Louis!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=}}, Thanks for coming out to St. Louis earlier this week to participate and enhance our community. Looking for slides from SpringOne Tour? You can find them, along with blogs, videos and all things Spring related here <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-tour-st-louis-2]]>. Please also join us this October 7-10 in Austin, Texas to network and learn from Spring community leaders. Get $100 off your SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/]]> ticket by using the code Attendee_SpringOneTour_100 when you register! In the meantime, get started <[[https://pivotal.io/platform/pcf-tutorials/getting-started-with-pivotal-cloud-foundry/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-springone-tour-stlouis-q119]]> with Spring on Cloud Foundry: for free on the public cloud, or on your workstation. I hope to see you again soon at a future event <[[https://pivotal.io/events]]>!
Thanks,
Tasha Isenberg
